name: UIDynamicItem
desc: A set of methods that can make a custom object eligible to participate in UIKit Dynamics.

items.name: var bounds: CGRect
items.desc: Called when a dynamic animator needs the bounds of the dynamic item.

items.name: var center: CGPoint
items.desc: The center point of the dynamic item.

items.name: var transform: CGAffineTransform
items.desc: The rotation of the dynamic item.

items.name: var collisionBoundsType: UIDynamicItemCollisionBoundsType
items.desc: The type of collision bounds associated with the item.

items.name: var collisionBoundingPath: UIBezierPath
items.desc: The path-based shape to use for the collision bounds.

items.name: enum UIDynamicItemCollisionBoundsType
items.desc: Constants that indicate the shape of the itemâ€™s collision bounds.
